messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Enemy communication intercepted. Security level elevated.

A summary has been copied and printed to all communications consoles.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Remember men,Never let the clowns win

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Make sure your face doesn't get raped by a little spider hand

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Word has it Xenos have invaded the ship. Stay safe crew if you see one don't be a hero call sec

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Weapons will be handed out at sec, The HoS has the right to not give you a weapon if he does not trust you

messages.author: Head of Personnel's Desk
messages.body: Comrades of the station. Come to HoP line if you wish to be assigned to the anti-xeno effort!

messages.author: Head of Personnel's Desk
messages.body: XENOS IN ARRIVALS EVERYONE READY UP TO FUCK THEM UP
